statements: SELECT * FROM biometric_payment_audit;
SELECT id, user_id, audit_timestamp FROM biometric_payment_audit WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM biometric_payment_audit WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT user_id, audit_timestamp FROM biometric_payment_audit ORDER BY audit_timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, user_id, audit_timestamp FROM biometric_payment_audit WHERE audit_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT id, user_id, audit_timestamp, compliance_status FROM biometric_payment_audit WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY audit_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM biometric_payment_audit WHERE compliance_status = true AND user_id IN (456, 789) ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, user_id, audit_timestamp FROM biometric_payment_audit WHERE audit_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND audit_timestamp <= '2022-06-30' ORDER BY user_id ASC, audit_timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, user_id, compliance_status FROM biometric_payment_audit WHERE compliance_status = false AND user_id = 456 ORDER BY id;
SELECT * FROM biometric_payment_audit WHERE audit_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM biometric_payments;
SELECT user_id, amount FROM biometric_payments WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT * FROM compliance_checks ORDER BY check_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, timestamp FROM biometric_payments WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT count(*) AS total_payments FROM biometric_payments;
SELECT user_id, amount FROM biometric_payments WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM biometric_payments WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp < '2022-02-01' ORDER BY payment_id;
SELECT payment_id, user_id, result FROM biometric_payments JOIN compliance_checks ON biometric_payments.user_id = compliance_checks.user_id WHERE result = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM biometric_payments WHERE user_id = 123 AND amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT user_id, AVG(amount) AS average_amount FROM biometric_payments GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY average_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM biometric_payments WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT user_id, amount FROM biometric_payments WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS num_checks FROM compliance_checks GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, MAX(check_date) AS latest_check FROM compliance_checks WHERE result = 'Passed';
SELECT user_id, AVG(amount) AS avg_amount FROM biometric_payments;
SELECT * FROM biometric_payments WHERE amount > 1000
SELECT user_id, amount FROM biometric_payments ORDER BY amount DESC
SELECT timestamp, amount FROM biometric_payments WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT user_id, amount, timestamp FROM biometric_payments WHERE amount < 500 ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM biometric_payments GROUP BY user_id
SELECT * FROM biometric_records;
SELECT id, user_id, timestamp FROM biometric_records WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT trans_id, user_id, amount FROM transaction_records ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT log_id, action, user_id, timestamp FROM audit_logs WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM compliance_checks WHERE check_type = 'Security' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT id, user_id, timestamp, fingerprint_data FROM biometric_records ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM transaction_records WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, action, timestamp FROM audit_logs WHERE action = 'login' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM compliance_checks WHERE check_type LIKE 'KYC%' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM biometric_records WHERE user_id = 1 OR user_id = 2 OR user_id = 3 ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM user_details WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_name, payment_amount FROM biometric_payments WHERE payment_amount > 100;
SELECT user_name, payment_date FROM biometric_payments WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT check_type, check_date FROM compliance_checks ORDER BY check_date DESC;
SELECT full_name, email_address, phone_number FROM user_details WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%'
SELECT * FROM user_details WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT full_name, email_address FROM user_details WHERE phone_number = '123-456-7890';
SELECT user_id, payment_amount, payment_date FROM biometric_payments WHERE payment_amount > 1000;
SELECT user_id, report_type, report_date FROM reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, check_type, check_date, check_result FROM compliance_checks WHERE user_id = 456 AND check_result = 'Pass';
